original_text: It was now two days before the Passover and the Feast of Unleavened Bread. And the chief priests and the scribes were seeking how to arrest him by stealth and kill him,
korean_text: 이틀이 지나면 유월절과 무교절이라 대제사장들과 서기관들이 예수를 흉계로 잡아 죽일 방도를 구하며

sentences.original_text: It was now two days before the Passover
and the Feast of Unleavened Bread.
And the chief priests and the scribes were seeking
how to arrest him by stealth
